# Avatar

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Avatar component displays a unique visual identifier for each user. The `content` prop can be used to pass a username, or an image URL.

If an image URL is passed to the `content` prop, the image identifies the user. If an image is not passed, the component generates a unique background image using the other props, including `hashString`.

## Usage

### Key Example

```jsx live
<BrContainer direction="row" horizontalGap="16px">
  <BrAvatar content="John Appleseed" hashString="9eabced3-b66d-4b31-914c-efbba790cb50" />
  <BrAvatar content="url(https://picsum.photos/200)" />
</BrContainer>
```


### Size

```jsx live
<BrContainer horizontalGap="16px" direction="row">
  <BrAvatar
    content="John Appleseed"
    hashString="9eabced3-b66d-4b31-914c-efbba790cb50"
    size="Large"
  />
  <BrAvatar
    content="John Blueberryseed"
    hashString="9eabced3-abba-4b31-914c-efbba790cb51"
    size="Normal"
  />
  <BrAvatar
    content="John Cantalopeseed"
    hashString="9eabced3-acca-4b31-914c-efbba790cb52"
    size="Small"
  />
  <BrAvatar
    content="John Damsonseed"
    hashString="9eabced3-adda-4b31-914c-efbba790cb53"
    size="Xsmall"
  />
</BrContainer>
```

## Slots

| Slot           | Description                               |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
|                | Passes alternative content to the avatar. |
| `"background"` | Passes background elements to the avatar. |


----------------------------------------------
